infos.title: The Royal Vermilion Blood
infos.story: A Vampire princess who joined Kyle in his war against the Demons 100 years ago. She is a pure-blood Vampire who has lived for over 500 years. Often considered the Queen of Vampires, she is nigh immortal. The tremendous expenditure of her power during the war against the Demons has taken its toll, and the immortal princess now assumes a child-like form. After the war, she blended into Human society and watched the world change over the next 100 years while slowly restoring her power. When the Demons reappeared and the Holy Sword awoke, Lewisia sensed the sudden shelifts of energy. Soon after, she left on a journey to find and observe the newly chosen warrior.

uw.name: Scarlet Ruler, Dominicia
uw.description: If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by (0). If HP is under 50%, takes (1) reduced DMG.
uw.story: A staff of blood that has been passed down in the family of the Vampire Lord through the generations. Its crimson color symbolizes the authority, insight, and the absolute power of the Vampire Lord. Deep in the underground of the Galia Plains is the holy land of the Vampires. This legendary staff lies there, ready to appear at the call of the master worthy of it, wherever that may be.

1.name: Old Silver Cup
1.description: [Blood Orb] Increases DMG by 50% and leaves (0) stacks of Blood Curse on the target.
1.story: An old silver cup of the first Vampire Queen. Queen used this cup to hold the blood of the one she cherished the most. It is a symbol of her immense sorrow and lunatic pleasure. It is a core item for holy rituals of Vampires, and the ones that go through the ritual of the cup are granted more beautiful and darkly colored Blood Orbs.

2.name: Spell of Bloody Mist
2.description: [Blood Zone] Increases DMG by (0) and the effect duration by 2 sec.
2.story: Magic tool of the successor of blood. The spells of the pure Vampire Lord's family have been passed down through generations.  The successor of Lewisia is Vampire Sir Lusben, and the Spell of Bloody Mist is a gift from him.  Lewisia hates anything that has to do with being a successor, but she likes how the Blood Zone reduces her fatigue, so she enjoys using it.

3.name: Blood of the Ancients
3.description: [Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by (0) and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
3.story: Ancient vampire queen's blood. The more pure-blooded a vampire is, the stronger their mana blood. The greatest of them all is the ancient vampire queen's blood, and vampires who drink her blood will have unlimited life and mana. It is a highly addictive type of blood, so be careful when using it.

4.name: Red Ring
4.description: [Blood Dominator] Increases DMG of Blood Curse by 50%. Upon attacking enemies inflicted with 100 or more stacks of Blood Curse, increases own ATK by 1% for 10 sec. ATK boost can be stacked up to max (0) times.
4.story: A ring that the underworld Vampire society in Galluah Plains presented to the Scarlet Ruler in respect. Since then the Vampires show their respect by kissing on the ring. When Lewisia was born, the previous Ruler passed the ring to her on the spot, proclaiming the birth of the new Ruler. Little did Lewisia know that the proclamation was actually the beginning of the ordeal she had to go through to become a new Ruler.

M.DMG over 10 times on the enemy and heals all allies' HP equal to 5% of the DMG dealt. After 10 sec, deals ??? M.DMG. If the target is a Boss, deals ??? additional M.DMG.

advancement.2: Increases DMG by 70%, and changes ATK Boost to 60%.

sw.story:
Blood of the Vampire lords have been engraved into Dominicia, which also contains strengths and wisdom of the vampire Lords.
Until now, Lewisia had only used her innate power as the pure-blooded vampire princess, using Dominicia as just an ordinary staff which she summoned freely.
One day, the moment Lewisia decided that she would use Dominicia's power as the ruler, all her surroundings became painted in blood-red. It was as if Dominicia had been waiting for Lewisia's decision
